mapper.select: /* MemberDao.chekcDuplicationUser */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE 1=1 AND ACNT = #{acnt}

/* MemberDao.selectTeacherMemberInfo */ SELECT A.USERID as userid ,A.ACNT as acnt ,A.PWD as pwd ,A.NM as nm ,A.EMAIL as email ,A.MOBNO as mobno ,A.STTS_CD as stts_cd ,A.TOS_AGRE_YN as tos_agre_yn ,A.USER_SE_CD as user_se_cd ,B.SCHL_NM as schl_nm ,B.SCHL_CD as schl_cd ,B.CHRG_CRS_NM as chrg_crs_nm ,B.CHRG_CRS_CD as chrg_crs_cd ,B.CLS_TCHR_YN as cls_tchr_yn FROM TB_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER_TEACHER B ON(A.USERID = B.USERID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.USERID = #{userid}
